text: The Daddy of Them All is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Bert Tracy - Ezra Jenkins (as Herbert Tracy) * Eva Bell - Mrs. Jenkins * Royal Byron - Michael Muldoon (as Roy Byron) * Harry Lorraine - Hez Whipple * Vincente DePascale - Pietro Olivatto (as V. Pascale) * Oliver Hardy - Peitzheimer (as Babe Hardy) * Billy Bowers - Chairman * James Levering - Secretary ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Daddy of Them All
